channel.title: Kryptix
channel.description:
I hope this isn't a troll...It seems real though.. R.I.P https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10151833207150581&set=p.10151833207150581&type=1

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Only found this out today. I didn’t get along with Luke most of the time but it’s sad to hear that someone you knew has passed away. I feel for his family.

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

I’m going to lock this topic. I’ve also banned another 2 people for being disrespectful. A human has passed, if he was your friend or foe is irrelevant. Be respectful.

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

I don’t care what any one saids. that was some sad shit i read, made me under stand Luke more and he wasn’t what we all think he was, he just was misunderstood

i want to say i am sorry for any thing i said bad to you luke may u rest in peace

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

I feel for his family from loosing a loved one, other than that… well lets just say ‘shit happens’

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @Dgc2002 Dgc2002
item.description:
@Dgc2002 wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:128, topic:445038”][quote author=Dgc2002 link=topic=547728.msg4021074#msg4021074 date=1340028607]

we should gather a time to meet up on RSCEmulation server, at the gravyard. someone should modify a coffin as Kryptix’s coffin and we say our prayers, he would honestly like that.

this may sound extremely nerdy, but death around here is VERY rare, especially to a well known RSC legend.


Not sure what to think about this. I wouldn’t care that its nerdy but I’m afraid it would get out of hands.

And about the npc. It would always be there reminding about Luke and I’m not sure is that the best way to handle grief :/.
Lets just all remember him the way we want. I wouldn’t seriously like seeing npc named Luke in lumby every time I die.

EDIT:

http://www.kentnews.co.uk/news/moving_tribute_from_parents_of_bike_crash_victim_luke_leary_1_1413780

A lot of information about Luke’s personal life.
Quite moving :/.
There is probably things Luke didn’t want to talk about with the people he knew online but we all have some “embarrassing” things we hide and I trust the people in this forum wont post some stupid shit.

That was really well written. I can’t help but wondering if the ‘special friend’ is Zilent, I know they were pretty close.
[/quote]Not IRL they weren’t.[/quote]

which cut him off from the world for a while, although he did meet a very special friend during this time.

Exactly. It never stated that his person was an IRL friend. Though its hard for me to say when exactly ‘this time’ was, how long ago isn’t quite stated.

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Rest in peace man, I never really knew you, but I’ve always seen you around. It’s always sad to see such a young and talented individual lose his or her life at such a young age…

@thread: Please stop spamming and arguing, take it somewhere else.

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @The_Boss2 The_Boss
item.description:
@The_Boss2 wrote:

R.I.P Luke

… R.I.P RSC. You’ll both be missed.

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:118, topic:445038”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=547728.msg4020410#msg4020410 date=1339978750]

[quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=547728.msg4020227#msg4020227 date=1339968768]

[quote author=Xazer link=topic=547728.msg4019938#msg4019938 date=1339950356]
GF our sub money… Probably paid for the bike he wrecked on. Always sucks when people die early but I’m not going to pretend I liked him just because he’s dead now.

Inb4 random lag or double backs in wildy become “the ghost of luke”
[/quote]Who cares what he bought with your sub money?
[/quote]Really? How many times was this point brought up?

When he started and had the vote on donations, he said that all of the money would go towards the server. This is because that is what Matt was doing, and Luke didn’t like it.

It’s they type of shit that made people hate him and got them really pissed off.
[/quote]Yes but he was making more than enough to cover the server. When Matt was doing it, the server was half-assed and he was in it purely for the money. If Luke got to make money doing something he liked doing, it would give him more incentive to produce better content (because it would mean more money for him). It also gave him more time to actually work on the server. If you didn’t agree with how he spent his own money, then you didn’t need to subscribe.[/quote]You must be a complete fucking retard. The issue isn’t that he made money off of it, the issue is that he said all of the money will go towards the server.

This has been said several dozen time, so go find a thread that it’s been discussed in, and read it.

Anyway, stop with your idiotic and ignorant posts. This thread isn’t for you being a dumbass, it’s for discussing Kryptix’s death. If you’d like to continue, make a new thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Kryptix
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:117, topic:445038”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=547728.msg4020227#msg4020227 date=1339968768]

[quote author=Xazer link=topic=547728.msg4019938#msg4019938 date=1339950356]
GF our sub money… Probably paid for the bike he wrecked on. Always sucks when people die early but I’m not going to pretend I liked him just because he’s dead now.

Inb4 random lag or double backs in wildy become “the ghost of luke”
[/quote]Who cares what he bought with your sub money?
[/quote]Really? How many times was this point brought up?

When he started and had the vote on donations, he said that all of the money would go towards the server. This is because that is what Matt was doing, and Luke didn’t like it.

It’s they type of shit that made people hate him and got them really pissed off.[/quote]Yes but he was making more than enough to cover the server. When Matt was doing it, the server was half-assed and he was in it purely for the money. If Luke got to make money doing something he liked doing, it would give him more incentive to produce better content (because it would mean more money for him). It also gave him more time to actually work on the server. If you didn’t agree with how he spent his own money, then you didn’t need to subscribe.

Read full topic
